name: Pentair plc
description: Pentair plc is a global leader in water and fluid management solutions, providing innovative and sustainable solutions to meet the world's water challenges. Founded in 1966 and headquartered in London, England, Pentair operates in various sectors, including residential, commercial, industrial, and agricultural markets. The company specializes in providing products and services that improve water quality, efficiency, and conservation. Pentair's diverse portfolio includes water filtration and purification systems, pumps, valves, and other fluid management technologies. With a commitment to sustainability, Pentair focuses on helping customers achieve their goals through water efficiency and conservation. The company's mission is to empower customers to make the most of their water resources while addressing the global challenge of water scarcity. Through continuous innovation and a strong emphasis on research and development, Pentair is dedicated to enhancing the quality of life for customers and communities around the world. The company has a robust global presence, with manufacturing facilities and service operations in multiple countries, enabling it to deliver tailored solutions and exceptional service to meet local needs.
